alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greenup and north central Carter Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gesling, or near Carter Caves State Park, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenbo Lake, Oldtown and Warnock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
